name: Paloma
title: Tech Lead
shortDescription: Worked with a leading Crypto Lender to write a bespoke solution for their institutional lending platform
longDescription:
Leading crypto currency lender (NDA), building them a bespoke product to replace legacy systems from the ground up. Integrated with multiple currency exchanges and increased efficiency of their processes exponentially while providing the rugged security expected of a top financial institution.

As a Tech Lead my primary role was to improve the developer experience. I achieved this by removing team impediments, mentoring developers and championing architectural changes which would provide long-term value.
